snippet: An early rally was mostly gone by the closing bell, leaving indexes with a mixed finish. Materials and energy companies slumped.
abstract: Late sell-off brings stocks down after early rally.
lead_paragraph: An early rally was mostly gone by the closing bell, leaving indexes with a mixed finish. Materials and energy companies slumped.

headline.main: Late Sell-Off Deflates an Early Rally After Yellen Testifies at Capitol
headline.print_headline: Late Sell-Off Deflates an Early Rally
